title: Intravascular hemolysis and acute renal failure following intermittent rifampin therapy.
abst: Renal failure is a rare complication associated with the use of rifampin. Intravascular hemolysis leading to acute renal failure following rifampin therapy is extremely rare. Two patients with leprosy who developed hemolysis and acute renal failure following rifampin are reported.
title_plus_abst: Intravascular hemolysis and acute renal failure following intermittent rifampin therapy. Renal failure is a rare complication associated with the use of rifampin. Intravascular hemolysis leading to acute renal failure following rifampin therapy is extremely rare. Two patients with leprosy who developed hemolysis and acute renal failure following rifampin are reported.
split_sentence: Intravascular hemolysis and acute renal failure following intermittent rifampin therapy.
Renal failure is a rare complication associated with the use of rifampin.
Intravascular hemolysis leading to acute renal failure following rifampin therapy is extremely rare.
Two patients with leprosy who developed hemolysis and acute renal failure following rifampin are reported.
